CSSScopeRule.summary: The CSSScopeRule interface of the CSS Object Model represents a CSS @scope at-rule.

CSSScopeRuleEnd.summary: The end property of the interface returns a string containing the value of the _scope at-rule's scope limit.
CSSScopeRuleEnd.value: A string, or null if the _scope at-rule has no scope limit defined.

CSSScopeRuleStart.summary: The start property of the interface returns a string containing the value of the _scope at-rule's scope root.
CSSScopeRuleStart.value: A string, or null if the _scope at-rule has no scope root defined.
